name: destinationSelection(for:direction:destination:extending:confined:)
desc: Returns a new selection that results from applying the navigation operations you specify to the text selection you provide.
declaration:
func destinationSelection(for textSelection: NSTextSelection, 
                direction: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Direction, 
              destination: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Destination, 
                extending: Bool, 
                 confined: Bool) -> NSTextSelection?
